title: docker image with -ipc=host option
body_html: Can you please clarify why you need -ipc=host instead of just specifying -shm-size at nvidia-docker run command? Purpose of -ipc=host is to place container on host IPC namespace and since all processes are within container namespace, should -shm-size not be enough? Thanks
